name: VR Roller Coaster: Real Water Ride Experience
name_original: VR Roller Coaster: Real Water Ride Experience
description:
Get ready to rock & roll for the amazing extreme ride on virtual roller coaster with VR Roller Coaster: Real Water Ride Experience! Sit back and buckle up for the ride of your life! Experience the real sensation and fear of riding a roller-coaster with your mobile virtual reality headset. This experience boasts a 360 VR FPS field of view, addicting and endless game play. This VR Roller Coaster: Real Water Ride Experience simulation game is for all mobile stereoscopic headset with a built in accelerometer.
Use your virtual reality headset to experience the thrill of riding a theme park ride of a roller coaster from where ever you like! Experience the real life fear and sensation of this Virtual Reality 3D roller coaster with the frag of excitement with VR Roller Coaster: Real Water Ride Experience.
Features:
1. Thrilling VR roller coaster experience realistic environments.
2. Endless fun and excitement for all the family.
3. An electrifying environment bursting with noisy crowds, snow, holiday season, mountains, birds, screaming riders and Santa Gifts.
